page.title: 04 WOODMANSEY
page.content: {Woodmansey}is situated one and a half miles South-East of {Beverley}on the main Hull-Beverley road. Not surprisingly, there is a road safety problem. This has been eased since the opening of a bypass. Woodmansey parish actually includes the hamlet of Thearne and some houses in Beverley -the population totals around 2,200. The main village is built almost entirely on the eastern side of the road and is in two parts, a ribbon development at the southern end, extending as far as the church (dedicated to St. Peter) and an estate at the northern end nearest Beverley.
